RIDING LESSONS AND TRAIL RIDES
/.header-wrap
think green.  think local.
●  Designated on-site parking area
​
●  Setup of location, including barn pavilion
●  Day-of coordination
●  Four-seater cart with driver
●  Bartender and server
●  Stunning coral sky sunsets from the barn pavillion
​
​
●  Services of a certified wedding officiant
●  Beautiful 10 acre farm and ranch property
A portable PA system with mic & mic stand for your ceremony
●  All tables, chairs & outdoor furniture
●  Use of our rustic Pole Barn
●
Speaker system & mixer in the barn
●  Music preparations with couples preferred playlist
●  Gorgeous lighting, in & outside
●  Wireless internet and phone access
●  All breakdown and cleanup
great full day wedding offer at a glance
everything you need in one place
An eight-hour window of time is available for your event, with an earliest starting time at 3pm and latest end time at 12am.
The 10 acre property includes a beautiful pole barn with a bar area, intimate bonsai garden, farm animals, and a charming indoor farmers market.
The wedding couple, or the bride and bridesmaids, have access to an air-conditioned sitting/ prep rooms on the property, starting the morning of the wedding day at 10am.
We will customize your special day based on size and vision!
Maximum capacity for a full day wedding is 400 guests, including the couple, and any children.
Our weddings
The High Country Pole Barn
Beautiful party space on of our pristine wooden barn, with plenty of space, a bar, gorgeous
lighting, and graveled outdoor area.
Hilltop Arena Pavilion
With a beautiful country equine vista, our grassy pavilion is the perfect spot for a ceremony or
classy cocktail hour, or for a tented ceremony during rainy weather.
Lawns, Ponds, and Gardens
Enjoy the series of ponds, canals, and Florida’s natural rolling meadow setting of Davie’s
countryside. Surrounded by Florida’s amazing ecosystem. Adding to the most extraordinary,
romantic setting for a southern wedding.
Real Restrooms alongside the Barn
Beautiful, spacious, fully integrated, real restrooms alongside the barn: two restrooms for the
ladies; two urinals and a restroom for the guys. We make sure all stays shiny clean.
All Your Dinner Chairs & Tables
Up to 200 folding chairs with seating and up to 20 8’ banquet tables are available and included
at the barn to seat all your guests for dinner: inside the pole barn, or out on the gravel.
Vintage wooden chairs are available ask for pricing and availability
Vintage Wooden Chairs for Your Ceremony
A set of up to 120 vintage wooden folding chairs can be set up for your ceremony at our hilltop
pavilion or lakeside. Pricing Available
Vintage Chairs
White wood or poly also available
Lights Galore
The barn and grounds come beautifully lit: hundreds of warm glowing lights, inside and around
the barn.
The Green Lis
t
An extensive and detailed list of vendor recommendations, with a focus on all local quality
specialists, caterers, florists, photographers, etc.
Speaker System
Four Bose speakers are installed in each corners of the dance floor. (Of course, deejays are
welcome to bring in their own gear as well.)
On-site Parking Area
Your guests will arrive at our parking area through a gated road on our property. There’s parking
space for approximately 60 cars.
Outdoor Furniture
Plenty of outdoor lounge options with our pallet furniture & haybales: in and outside
the farm, at the pavilion, and at the fire pit.
Wifi and Phone Access
With freely accessible wifi in and around the barn, and a retro style phone available in our
restroom section, you and your guests stay connected to “the real world.”
A Portable PA Systems with Mics
Our two portable, rechargeable PA systems with mic and mic stands are handy for amplification
in the pine grove, or for background music in the pavilion.
The Lodging List
Our Lodging List with over 125 of the best accommodations in the area will make finding the
right place to stay for you and your guests a breeze.
Professional Assistance
Tons of advice, a walk-through with our chef, and of course representation and assistance on
the day of setup and day of event, by a team of dedicated pros.
Rehearsal Time on Previous Afternoon
You’ll have two hours during the afternoon previous to your wedding day to drop off items,
decorate, or have a ceremony rehearsal, from 4pm till 6pm.
Plenty of Time to Celebrat
e
You may set an 8-hour time window for your celebration, anytime between 2pm and 11pm
We’ll do the Cleanup
We want you to have a carefree celebration from start to finish. So we do the cleanup, and you
have the morning after your wedding to come and collect any items left behind.
Bonfire
Bonfires at our place are  spectacular. Setup, lighting, and monitoring of a large-size
bonfire.
Luminaries
Setup and lighting of a meandering line up of flickering luminaries leading up to the fire pit,
creating a magical, guiding path.
Cart with Driver
Ideal for less mobile guests: our 4-person cart with driver, is available from the moment guests
arrive for the festivities till the end of the wedding day.
​
​
